# node_id: # This file is consumed by AddressMap (address_map_config) and is interpreted on *virtual* addresses.
# The node_id field is matched against the per-process node_id used by the simulator.

start: ensure the CXL buffer VA range is fixed per node_id.

# node_id: # target: destination node id (for remote/pool); ignored for local
# Example: map 1 MiB at 0x8000_0000 to a pool node (id 100)
